tool.name: OGS: CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines'.
tool.command: CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines $gml --type '$type' --search-length '$search_length' #for $f in $input_geometry: --input-geometry '$f' #end for #for $f in $mesh_file: --mesh-file '$f' #end for #for $f in $gmsh_path: --gmsh-path '$f' #end for --output-base-file-name output_1

param.name: gml
param.label: gml
param.help: Write found nodes to gml file.

param.name: type
param.label: type
param.help: the process type the boundary condition will be written for currently

param.name: search_length
param.label: search length
param.help: The size of the search length

param.name: input_geometry
param.label: input geometry
param.help: Input (.gml | .gli). The name of the input file containing the

param.name: mesh_file
param.label: mesh file
param.help: Input (.vtu). The name of the input file containing the mesh

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: Input (.msh). The path to the gmsh binary

tool.help: This tool runs the **CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
